title: The pinned apps at home screen of pixel 3xl cannot open, but ok if touch at upper edge of the apps.
content:
Trying to touch at the very top edge of the pinned apps -> ok.
Swipe up and enter to the apps drawer and open the apps at the same position of the pinned apps (at home screen) -> opened smoothly.
Trying to use 3rd party launcher and touch the home screen apps (at the same position) -> open smoothly.

So, I guess this is an issue or error of the pixel launcher. Ever this issue happened before?
How is solution?

Thanks!
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
